affinity.description: Add `affinities` to the Crossplane pod deployment.
affinity.title: affinity

args.description: Add custom arguments to the Crossplane pod.
args.title: args

packages.description: A list of Configuration packages to install.
packages.title: packages

customAnnotations.description: Add custom `annotations` to the Crossplane pod deployment.
customAnnotations.title: customAnnotations

customLabels.description: Add custom `labels` to the Crossplane pod deployment.
customLabels.title: customLabels

deploymentStrategy.description: The deployment strategy for the Crossplane and RBAC Manager pods.
deploymentStrategy.title: deploymentStrategy

dnsPolicy.description: Specify the `dnsPolicy` to be used by the Crossplane pod.
dnsPolicy.title: dnsPolicy

extraEnvVarsCrossplane.description:
Add custom environmental variables to the Crossplane pod deployment application container.
Replaces any `.` in a variable name with `_`. For example, `SAMPLE.KEY=value1` becomes `SAMPLE_KEY=value1`.
extraEnvVarsCrossplane.title: extraEnvVarsCrossplane

extraEnvVarsCrossplaneInit.description:
Add custom environmental variables to the Crossplane pod deployment init container.
Replaces any `.` in a variable name with `_`. For example, `SAMPLE.KEY=value1` becomes `SAMPLE_KEY=value1`.
extraEnvVarsCrossplaneInit.title: extraEnvVarsCrossplaneInit

extraEnvVarsRBACManager.description:
Add custom environmental variables to the RBAC Manager pod deployment.
Replaces any `.` in a variable name with `_`. For example, `SAMPLE.KEY=value1` becomes `SAMPLE_KEY=value1`.
extraEnvVarsRBACManager.title: extraEnvVarsRBACManager

extraObjects.description: To add arbitrary Kubernetes Objects during a Helm Install
extraObjects.title: extraObjects

extraVolumeMountsCrossplane.description: Add custom `volumeMounts` to the Crossplane pod. Supports template expressions.
extraVolumeMountsCrossplane.title: extraVolumeMountsCrossplane

extraVolumesCrossplane.description: Add custom `volumes` to the Crossplane pod. Supports template expressions.
extraVolumesCrossplane.title: extraVolumesCrossplane

packages.description: A list of Function packages to install
packages.title: packages

medium.description: Set to `Memory` to hold the function cache in a RAM backed file system. Useful for Crossplane development.
medium.title: medium

pvc.description: The name of a PersistentVolumeClaim to use as the function cache. Disables the default function cache `emptyDir` Volume.
pvc.title: pvc

sizeLimit.description: The size limit for the function cache. If medium is `Memory` the `sizeLimit` can't exceed Node memory.
sizeLimit.title: sizeLimit

global.description: Global values are values that can be accessed from any chart or subchart by exactly the same name.
global.title: global

hostNetwork.description: Enable `hostNetwork` for the Crossplane deployment. Caution: enabling `hostNetwork` grants the Crossplane Pod access to the host network namespace. Consider setting `dnsPolicy` to `ClusterFirstWithHostNet`.
hostNetwork.title: hostNetwork

ignoreTag.description: Do not use the {{ .image.tag }} value to compute the image uri.
ignoreTag.title: ignoreTag

pullPolicy.description: The image pull policy used for Crossplane and RBAC Manager pods.
pullPolicy.title: pullPolicy

repository.description: Repository for the Crossplane pod image.
repository.title: repository

tag.description: The Crossplane image tag. Defaults to the value of `appVersion` in `Chart.yaml`.
tag.title: tag

imagePullSecrets.description: The imagePullSecret names to add to the Crossplane ServiceAccount.
imagePullSecrets.title: imagePullSecrets

enabled.description: Enable Prometheus path, port and scrape annotations and expose port 8080 for both the Crossplane and RBAC Manager pods.
enabled.title: enabled

port.description: The port the metrics server listens on.
port.title: port

nodeSelector.description: Add `nodeSelectors` to the Crossplane pod deployment.
nodeSelector.title: nodeSelector

configMap.description: The name of a ConfigMap to use as the package cache. Disables the default package cache `emptyDir` Volume.
configMap.title: configMap

medium.description: Set to `Memory` to hold the package cache in a RAM backed file system. Useful for Crossplane development.
medium.title: medium

pvc.description: The name of a PersistentVolumeClaim to use as the package cache. Disables the default package cache `emptyDir` Volume.
pvc.title: pvc

sizeLimit.description: The size limit for the package cache. If medium is `Memory` the `sizeLimit` can't exceed Node memory.
sizeLimit.title: sizeLimit

podSecurityContextCrossplane.description: Add a custom `securityContext` to the Crossplane pod.
podSecurityContextCrossplane.title: podSecurityContextCrossplane

podSecurityContextRBACManager.description: Add a custom `securityContext` to the RBAC Manager pod.
podSecurityContextRBACManager.title: podSecurityContextRBACManager

priorityClassName.description: The PriorityClass name to apply to the Crossplane and RBAC Manager pods.
priorityClassName.title: priorityClassName

defaultActivations.description: Define entries for the default managed resource activation policy. If defined, a default MRAP will contain these activations.
defaultActivations.title: defaultActivations

packages.description: A list of Provider packages to install.
packages.title: packages

affinity.description: Add `affinities` to the RBAC Manager pod deployment.
affinity.title: affinity

args.description: Add custom arguments to the RBAC Manager pod.
args.title: args

deploy.description: Deploy the RBAC Manager pod and its required roles.

leaderElection.description: Enable [leader election](https://docs.crossplane.io/latest/guides/pods/#leader-election) for the RBAC Manager pod.
leaderElection.title: leaderElection

nodeSelector.description: Add `nodeSelectors` to the RBAC Manager pod deployment.
nodeSelector.title: nodeSelector

replicas.description: The number of RBAC Manager pod `replicas` to deploy.
replicas.title: replicas

revisionHistoryLimit.description: The number of RBAC Manager ReplicaSets to retain.
revisionHistoryLimit.title: revisionHistoryLimit

tolerations.description: Add `tolerations` to the RBAC Manager pod deployment.
tolerations.title: tolerations

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Add `topologySpreadConstraints` to the RBAC Manager pod deployment.
topologySpreadConstraints.title: topologySpreadConstraints

port.description: The port the readyz server listens on.
port.title: port

key.description: The ConfigMap key containing a custom CA bundle to enable fetching packages from registries with unknown or untrusted certificates.
key.title: key

name.description: The ConfigMap name containing a custom CA bundle to enable fetching packages from registries with unknown or untrusted certificates.
name.title: name

replicas.description:
helm-docs renders these comments into markdown. Use markdown formatting where
appropiate.

revisionHistoryLimit.title: revisionHistoryLimit

customAnnotations.title: customAnnotations

readOnlyRootFilesystem.title: readOnlyRootFilesystem

runAsGroup.description: The group ID used by the Crossplane pod.
runAsGroup.title: runAsGroup

runAsUser.description: The user ID used by the Crossplane pod.
runAsUser.title: runAsUser

allowPrivilegeEscalation.title: allowPrivilegeEscalation

readOnlyRootFilesystem.description: Set the RBAC Manager pod root file system as read-only.
readOnlyRootFilesystem.title: readOnlyRootFilesystem

runAsGroup.description: The group ID used by the RBAC Manager pod.

runAsUser.description: The user ID used by the RBAC Manager pod.
runAsUser.title: runAsUser

customAnnotations.description: Configure annotations on the service object. Only enabled when webhooks.enabled = true
customAnnotations.title: customAnnotations

create.description: Specifies whether Crossplane ServiceAccount should be created
create.title: create

customAnnotations.description: Add custom `annotations` to the Crossplane ServiceAccount.
customAnnotations.title: customAnnotations

name.description: Provide the name of an already created Crossplane ServiceAccount. Required when `serviceAccount.create` is `false`
name.title: name

sidecarsCrossplane.description: Add sidecar containers to the Crossplane pod. Supports template expressions.
